price: Hakika Sisi tunahuisha na tunafisha, na kwetu Sisi ndio marejeo.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نُحۡيِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيۡنَا ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
footnotes: Hakika Sisi, peke yetu, ndio tunao huisha viumbe vyote, na tunavifisha duniani. Na kwetu Sisi, peke yetu, ndio marejeo Akhera.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nuḥ'yī wanumītu wa-ilaynā al-maṣīru
